articles.description: MOBILE, Ala. (WKRG) — Videos of a fight at a local teen hangout have gone viral on social media. The fight happened on Saturday night at the Altitude Trampoline Park. WKRG News 5 did not receive permission to use those videos but you can evidently see at leas…
